import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Card, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import jersey from "./IMG/jersey.jpg"; import necklace from "./IMG/necklace.jpg"; import watch from "./IMG/watch.jpg"; import bag from "./IMG/bag.jpg"; import airpod from "./IMG/airpod.jpg"; import purse from "./IMG/purse.jpg"; import suit from "./IMG/suit.jpg"; import slippers from "./IMG/slippers.jpg"; function Products() { const [products] = useState( { title: "Necklace", cost: "$5.99", image: "./IMG/jersey.jpg", }, { title: "Necklace", cost: "$5.99", image: "./IMG/jersey.jpg", } ); return (

FEATURED PRODUCTS

{products.map((product) => ( {product.title} {product.cost} ))} {/* Necklace This is a product */} {/* Jersey This is a product Watch This is a product Airpod This is a product Bag This is a product Purse This is a product Suit This is a product Slippers This is a product */}
); } export default Products;
